title: Your plugin's name
type: one of background, unobtrusive, exclusive, widget
requestMapAccess: reason currently not shown to user but required if wanted or empty when none required

toolbars.title: empty when to add to the existing map toolbar, else a text visible to the user as the title of the created toolbar

items.id: an identificator of your choosing for you to be able to differentiate event handler returns
items.text: becomes placeholder, innerText, label or nothing

event type: properties of the event object to return, those type must be of either string, number or boolean
